post.body: some of the notes on there are just unbelievable lol
it was unexpected :) and good
good to know - love starting an entertaining series
no just watched episode 1 of season 2 so far
ah I have been there but never tried the buns - will have to try it next time I am in town :)
where do you get vegan roast pork buns from?
so far so good - very easy to use thanks :)
I just tried it and it is really easy to use - so far so good thanks :)
oh thanks I will give it a try
what do you mean?
are you headed to Asheville? We will be there starting sunday for a week
that's awesome grats!
I do a sinus rinse that is not as weird as the pot - really helps allergies...not so bad once you try it
oh haha - that blurb sounded like a joke or I hope it was lol
lol what is that? a job app response?
hope it continues to be productive - thanks for the timezone reminder - awesome that twiterverse is so international!
hope you feel better ; I had a udon soup bowl from Heiwa the other day
yikes where did you get food poisoning?
well said!
well said - I wouldn't want them following me either
yum! Sounds good
sounds like you are going to do a lot of cooking - have fun!
have fun! Love the pools and waterfall massages!
Asheville for xmas; Sedona for New years
My co-worker describes himself as being proactive......by asking me to do something for him LOL
Constantly trying to get my work mailbox below 150 mb
Listening to Yo-Yo-Ma's songs of joy and peace album; thanks Ruckus!
Working out and studying
Contemplating inflation vs relative price changes
Browsing Sedona links for our upcoming vacation
Writing an overview report on an opinion leadership scale I developed
Gonna watch Dexter season 2 episode 1, wondering how Dexter season 2 could be better than season 1 - thought season 1 was great!
Just finished an interesting discussion about online advertising with my corporate mentor
Omg passive aggressive notes.com is too funny
the amazon universal wish list is awesome!
Pretty excited I was able to locate an email from 2007 in my well organized sent archive!
Love days when Catbert makes an appearance
home from work - now time to study for finance before dinner
Proud that Elizabeth (my sister in law) won a bake-off with her vegan cake!!
really liking the new Killers album
Getting ready to go out with Drew and Crys
Surprised at how loud my neighbor's kids are - trampolines need to be banned
is laughing at Jason's life according to Itunes - life's purpose = skin trade hah
need to go pick up some Chanukah cards
Waking up to a miracle
Graduation celebration I am going to jump out of a plane who's in??
Glad to get in a run before dark - now time for dinner and wine bar
I have so much to be grateful for
Omg I am so happy about my accounting grade!
Wishing peace for this hurting world
just remembered tomorrow is causual day - I usually spend more time choosing an outfit for casual day than a normal work day
Was tricked by ad on CNET
what a great gift idea for the fashionable dog - collar of the month club! http://tinyurl.com/5tkrs2
any have recommendation for free virus software?
Trying to get some work done without random people interrupting me
Rejoice our estate planning is finally complete and official!
Ok done with work now just need to get thru 15 hrs of classes before vacation starts
Colleague says to me I'd rather come to work next week than sit at home with the kids......
Picking up Abby's bithday cake
today I learned that I am a testatrix
did you know that passing funds directly from your retirement account/IRA to a charitable organization is free of fed and state tax?
My beautiful weim, Abby is 10 today!
Team meeting
Finding myself watching legally blonde
Making progress on customer analysis for new product
Nice a flight I put on hold for 609 yesterday is now 269!
Actually getting work done with min interruptions - hopefully it stays that way
what brilliant research! http://snipr.com/8bydq
Trying to find peace
Having lunch at Laughing Seed then going to see Slumdog Millionaire
Going to check out Jake's new telescope
Getting ready to go on a Christmas hike
working on an economics paper - think I am doing way too much word smithing
Wishing you peace and much love
Singing Christmas carols
Wine tasting at the Biltmore
Slept in and just woke up
Reading a historical fiction - The Lady Elizabeth
Dinner at Laughing seed - life is good
Headed to the Blue ridge mountains for Christmas - we will have grand total of six dogs with us!
